00038 bool DnsSdProxyClient::StartBrowse( bool NotifyOnlyNewEvent /* = false */ )
00039 {
00040     // Add myself to the DnsSdClientlist
00041     return DnsSdProxy::AddClient( this, NotifyOnlyNewEvent );

00050 DnsSdServicesList::DnsSdServicesList()
00051 {
00052     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00053
00054     DnsSdProxy::CurrentNumberOfServicesListCopies++;
00055 }

00057 DnsSdServicesList::~DnsSdServicesList()
00058 {
00059     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00060
00061     DnsSdProxy::CurrentNumberOfServicesListCopies--;
00062 }
00063
00064 DnsSdProxy::DnsSdProxy()
00065 {
00066     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00067
00068     InstancesCount++;
00069     if ( InstancesCount == 1 )
00070     {
00071         // First Instance
00072         OmiscidTrace( "Launch DnsSdProxy instance.\n" );
00073
00074         // Reset Event (in case we were over 1 instance, under 1 and them over 1 again
00075         Changes.Reset();
00076
00077         ServiceBroswer = new OMISCID_TLM BrowseForDNSSDService( CommonServiceValues::GetOmiscidServiceDnsSdType(), BrowseCollect, (void *)this );
00078         if ( ServiceBroswer == NULL )
00079         {
00080             OmiscidError( "Launch DnsSdProxy instance => failed\n" );
00081             // Let InstancesCount be 0, we will retry later
00082             InstancesCount = 0;
00083             NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;
00084         }
00085
00086         // Start browsing
00087         ServiceBroswer->Start();
00088     }
00089 }
00090
00091 DnsSdProxy::~DnsSdProxy()
00092 {
00093     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00094
00095     if ( InstancesCount == 1 )
00096     {
00097         // I am the last Instance
00098         InstancesCount = 0;
00099         OmiscidTrace( "Last DnsSdProxy instance. Stop it.\n" );
00100
00101         DnsSdServiceInstanceManager * pSIM;
00102
00103         // Empty the list of current services
00104         while( ServicesList.GetNumberOfElements() != 0 )
00105         {
00106             pSIM = ServicesList.ExtractFirst();
00107             if ( pSIM != (DnsSdServiceInstanceManager *)NULL )
00108             {
00109                 delete pSIM;
00110             }
00111         }
00112
00113         // Say that we do not need to do cleanup action
00114         NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;
00115
00116         if ( ServiceBroswer )
00117         {
00118             // Leave mutex to prevent deadlock
00119             SL_Locker.Unlock();
00120             delete ServiceBroswer;
00121
00122             // Reenter mutex
00123             SL_Locker.Lock();
00124             ServiceBroswer = NULL;
00125         }
00126
00127         // Send signals to wake up everybody waiting...
00128         Changes.Signal();
00129     }
00130 }

00132 // Init static data for the DnsSdProx class
00133
00134 // To protect all my private stuff...
00135 ReentrantMutex DnsSdProxy::Locker;
00136
00137 // A counter of instances
00138 unsigned int DnsSdProxy::InstancesCount = 0; // Start with 0 instances
00139
00140 // Number of "copies" of the service in use
00141 unsigned int DnsSdProxy::CurrentNumberOfServicesListCopies = 0; // Start with 0 customers
00142
00143 // A boolean saying that we need to remove services in the list
00144 bool DnsSdProxy::NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;     // At start we do not need to cleanup everything
00145
00146 // A list to contain all the services
00147 SimpleList<DnsSdProxy::DnsSdServiceInstanceManager*> DnsSdProxy::ServicesList;
00148
00149 // Event to say that I have new thing to
00150 Event DnsSdProxy::Changes;
00151 BrowseForDNSSDService * DnsSdProxy::ServiceBroswer = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)NULL;     // protected by a mutex
00152
00153 // manage futur notification paradigm
00154 SimpleList<DnsSdProxyClient*> DnsSdProxy::ClientsList;
00155
00156 // WARNING : we do not call the mutex lock !
00157 void DnsSdProxy::CleanupServicesList()
00158 {
00159     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00160
00161     DnsSdServiceInstanceManager * pServiceInfo;
00162
00163     // Shall we cleanup the List ?
00164     if ( NeedToCleanupServicesList == true && CurrentNumberOfServicesListCopies == 0 )
00165     {
00166         // walk among the list to remove old entries
00167         for( ServicesList.First(); ServicesList.NotAtEnd(); ServicesList.Next() )
00168         {
00169             pServiceInfo = ServicesList.GetCurrent();
00170             if ( pServiceInfo->IsPresent == false )
00171             {
00172                 // ok remove it from the list
00173                 ServicesList.RemoveCurrent();
00174
00175                 // destroy it
00176                 delete pServiceInfo;
00177             }
00178         }
00179
00180         // cleanup done
00181         NeedToCleanupServicesList = false;
00182     }
00183 }
00184
00185 bool DnsSdProxy::IsEnabled()
00186 {
00187     bool ret = false;
00188
00189     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00190
00191     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00192     CleanupServicesList();
00193
00194     // Is there some proxy running ?
00195     if ( InstancesCount > 0 )
00196     {
00197         ret = true;
00198     }
00199
00200     return ret;
00201 }
00202
00203 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE DnsSdProxy::BrowseCollect( DnsSdService& NewService, unsigned int flags, void * UserData )
00204 {
00205     DnsSdServiceInstanceManager * pServiceInfo;
00206
00207     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00208
00209     // Look is we need to continue to work
00210     if ( InstancesCount == 0 )
00211     {
00212         // quit
00213         return;
00214     }
00215
00216     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00217     {
00218         // A new service appears
00219         // DevOmiscidTrace( "A new service appear in DnsSd : %s\n", NewService.Name.GetStr() );
00220
00221         // Search if this service is already registered in case of multiple network interface
00222         // services may appear several times
00223         for( ServicesList.First(); ServicesList.NotAtEnd(); ServicesList.Next() )
00224         {
00225             if ( NewService.CompleteServiceName == ServicesList.GetCurrent()->CompleteServiceName )
00226             {
00227                 // quit
00228                 return;
00229             }
00230         }
00231
00232         // Copy each members of this list into the new list
00233         pServiceInfo = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdServiceInstanceManager( NewService );
00234         if ( pServiceInfo != NULL )
00235         {
00236             ServicesList.AddTail( pServiceInfo );
00237
00238             // Call all DnsSdProxyClients
00239             for( ClientsList.First(); ClientsList.NotAtEnd(); ClientsList.Next() )
00240             {
00241                 ClientsList.GetCurrent()->DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( flags, *pServiceInfo );
00242             }
00243
00244             // Said to the waiters that a service appears
00245             Changes.Signal();
00246         }
00247
00248         // Shall we cleanup the List ?
00249         CleanupServicesList();
00250     }
00251     else
00252     {
00253         // A new service desappears.
00254         // Search it in the list
00255         for( ServicesList.First(); ServicesList.NotAtEnd(); ServicesList.Next() )
00256         {
00257             // Copy each members of this list into the new list
00258             if ( ServicesList.GetCurrent()->CompleteServiceName.EqualsCaseInsensitive( NewService.CompleteServiceName )  )
00259             {
00260
00261                 // Call all DnsSdProxyClients
00262                 for( ClientsList.First(); ClientsList.NotAtEnd(); ClientsList.Next() )
00263                 {
00264                     ClientsList.GetCurrent()->DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( flags, *ServicesList.GetCurrent() );
00265                 }
00266
00267                 // Ok, we've got it, can we remove it ?
00268                 if ( CurrentNumberOfServicesListCopies == 0 )
00269                 {
00270                     pServiceInfo = ServicesList.GetCurrent();
00271                     ServicesList.RemoveCurrent();
00272                     delete pServiceInfo;
00273                 }
00274                 else
00275                 {
00276                     // Say that we will remove it in the future
00277                     ServicesList.GetCurrent()->IsPresent = false;
00278                     NeedToCleanupServicesList = true;
00279                 }
00280
00281                 // Say something change
00282                 Changes.Signal();
00283                 break;
00284             }
00285         }
00286     }
00287 }
00288
00289 DnsSdServicesList * DnsSdProxy::GetCurrentServicesList()
00290 {
00291     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00292
00293     // Is there some proxy running ?
00294     if ( InstancesCount == 0 )
00295     {
00296         return NULL;
00297     }
00298
00299     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00300     CleanupServicesList();
00301
00302     DnsSdServicesList * pList = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdServicesList;
00303     if ( pList == NULL )
00304     {
00305         return NULL;
00306     }
00307
00308     for( ServicesList.First(); ServicesList.NotAtEnd(); ServicesList.Next() )
00309     {
00310         // Copy each members of this list into the new list
00311         DnsSdServiceInstanceManager * pServiceInfo = ServicesList.GetCurrent();
00312         // If the service is here, put it in the list
00313         if ( pServiceInfo->IsPresent == true )
00314         {
00315             pList->AddTail( ServicesList.GetCurrent() );
00316         }
00317     }
00318
00319     return pList;
00320 }
00321
00322 bool DnsSdProxy::AddClient( DnsSdProxyClient * Client, bool NotifyOnlyNewEvent /* = false */ )
00323 {
00324     if ( Client == NULL )
00325     {
00326         return false;
00327     }
00328
00329     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00330
00331     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00332     CleanupServicesList();
00333
00334     // Add client
00335     ClientsList.AddTail( Client );
00336
00337     // Unlock to prevent too long locking
00338     // SL_Locker.Unlock();
00339
00340     // Send already arrived services to this client is requested
00341     if ( NotifyOnlyNewEvent == false )
00342     {
00343         AutoDelete<DnsSdServicesList> CurrentServicesList = GetCurrentServicesList();
00344         if ( CurrentServicesList == (DnsSdServicesList *)NULL )
00345         {
00346             // Nothing for the moment
00347             return true;
00348         }
00349
00350         DnsSdService * pService;
00351         for( CurrentServicesList->First(); CurrentServicesList->NotAtEnd(); CurrentServicesList->Next() )
00352         {
00353             pService = CurrentServicesList->GetCurrent();
00354             if ( pService != (DnsSdServiceInstanceManager *)NULL )
00355             {
00356                 Client->DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd, *pService );
00357             }
00358         }
00359
00360         // AutoDelete will delete my copies of list
00361     }
00362
00363     return true;
00364 }
00365
00366 bool DnsSdProxy::RemoveClient( DnsSdProxyClient * Client, bool NotifyAsIfServicesDisappear /* = false */ )
00367 {
00368     if ( Client == NULL )
00369     {
00370         return false;
00371     }
00372
00373     SmartLocker SL_Locker(DnsSdProxy::Locker);
00374
00375     // Shall we cleanup the services list
00376     CleanupServicesList();
00377
00378     for( ClientsList.First(); ClientsList.NotAtEnd(); ClientsList.Next() )
00379     {
00380         if ( ClientsList.GetCurrent() == Client )
00381         {
00382             // Remove client from the list
00383             ClientsList.RemoveCurrent();
00384
00385             // Unlock mutex to prevent to loong locking
00386             SL_Locker.Unlock();
00387
00388             // If asked, let's say that current services are not here anymore
00389             if ( NotifyAsIfServicesDisappear == true )
00390             {
00391                 AutoDelete<DnsSdServicesList> CurrentServicesList = GetCurrentServicesList();
00392                 if ( CurrentServicesList == (DnsSdServicesList *)NULL )
00393                 {
00394                     // Nothing for the moment
00395                     return true;
00396                 }
00397
00398                 DnsSdService * pService;
00399                 for( CurrentServicesList->First(); CurrentServicesList->NotAtEnd(); CurrentServicesList->Next() )
00400                 {
00401                     pService = CurrentServicesList->GetCurrent();
00402                     if ( pService != (DnsSdServiceInstanceManager *)NULL )
00403                     {
00404                         Client->DnsSdProxyServiceBrowseReply( 0, *pService );
00405                     }
00406                 }
00407
00408                 // AutoDelete will do the job for me here in deleting
00409             }
00410
00411             return true;
00412         }
00413     }
00414
00415     return false;
00416 }
00417
00418 bool DnsSdProxy::WaitForChanges(unsigned int TimeToWait)
00419 {
00420     if ( DnsSdProxy::IsEnabled() == false )
00421     {
00422         return false;
00423     }
00424
00425     return Changes.Wait( TimeToWait );
00426 }
